tasks.label: valgrind
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceRoot} && make fclean && make re && valgrind --leak-check=full --show-leak-kinds=all --track-origins=yes --verbose ./minishell

tasks.label: leaks
tasks.command: while true ; do leaks minishell ; sleep 1 ; done

tasks.label: test
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceRoot} && make re && cd tester && rm minishell || true && bash test.sh --fast
